revision.text:
{{talkheader}} {{WPAVIATION|class=start | b1 = y | b2 = y | b3 = y | b4 = y | b5 = y |Aircraft-project=yes}} {{WikiProject Military history|class=C|B1=y|B2=n|B3=y|B4=y|B5=y|Aviation=yes|Japanese=yes}} == Photograph == (not given supporting materials due to uncertainty over licensing of the photograph) I am a user of a Japanese version. Is the copyright in this photograph really GFDL? Japan defense ministry Technical Research and Development Institute is forbidding reprint without permission in the photograph. [http://www.mod.go.jp/trdi/riyou.html TRDI (Japanese)]--[[User:210.131.1.48|210.131.1.48]] 13:04, 30 July 2007 (UTC) == Proper designation == What is this aircraft's proper designation - the article uses a mix of "C-X", "XC-2" and "C-2". It isn't always clear which designation relates to which stage of the development process. As I understand it the initial design was called "C-X", the test prototype(s) "XC-2" and the actual certified production version is the "C-2". I'm not at all sure that I understand it correctly and the article (as it is now) doesn't really help to clarify the matter. [[User:Dodger67|Roger]] ([[User talk:Dodger67|talk]]) 08:18, 11 November 2010 (UTC) :The development program was designated C-X, The first prototype is designasted XC-2, the procurement program is designated C-2. Seemples, yes.[[User:Petebutt|Petebutt]] ([[User talk:Petebutt|talk]]) 09:39, 13 January 2011 (UTC) == Requested move ==
:''The following discussion is an archived discussion of a [[WP:requested moves|requested move]]. '''Please do not modify it.''' Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on the talk page. Editors desiring to contest the closing decision should consider a [[Wikipedia:move review|move review]]. No further edits should be made to this section. '' The result of the move request was: '''not moved''': insufficient support. [[User:DrKiernan|DrKiernan]] ([[User talk:DrKiernan|talk]]) 16:39, 16 October 2012 (UTC) ---- [[Kawasaki C-2]] → {{no redirect|Kawasaki XC-2}} – To reflect the name of the aircraft rather than the procurement program. Per Kawasaki Heavy Industries' own website: http://www.khi.co.jp/english/aero/product/airplanes/xc_2.html [[User talk:Memphisto|memphisto]] 12:39, 3 October 2012 (UTC) :'''Oppose''' the XC-2 is only the prototype, if it doesnt go into production it may be appropriate but it is certain the series build aircraft will be C-2s. [[User:MilborneOne|MilborneOne]] ([[User talk:MilborneOne|talk]]) 18:36, 4 October 2012 (UTC) :''The above discussion is preserved as an archive of a [[WP:RM|requested move]]. '''Please do not modify it.''' Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on this talk page or in a [[WP:move review|move review]]. No further edits should be made to this section.
